name: Marry Me Romantic Wedding Banner/Burlap/Rustic Wedding/Eco Friendly Wedding/Boho Wedding/Wall Decor/
description:
(International Customers we welcome you! Please convo us before purchase with your country, so that we can give you your shipping quote. Thanks for understanding)

Oh, how I love this line in the movie Emma from Mr. Knightley--- "Marry me. Marry me, my wonderful, darling friend."

Natural romance is truly what its all about. Help your love to say "Yes!" with this darling round shaped, Burlap Banner with two simple words: "Marry Me?" stenciled in Black with a sweet removable flower between the two words! (Letters and accent flower can be made in your choice of color---just send us a convo). Note: (This is a stock photo. This banner can also be made in the usual triangle shape if you prefer.)

Our medium size "Marry Me?" banner will be a romantic surprise if you mail it to your beloved for them to open or if you hang it yourself in a special place for them to find! What a simple way to show your love to that special someone. If you want to send a longer message, why not pair this banner with our deluxe "I love You" banner seen in picture #3 and here: http://www.etsy.com/listing/63104396/i-love-you-personalized-romantic-wedding (Convo me for a special package price, when you purchase both banners!)

This banner is a Medium size and measures 4 ft. There are hemp cord ties on each side that measure 2.5 ft each.

Please allow 5 - 7 days for your banner to be made. Banner is made of 100% eco-friendly materials and is securely sewn with treated edges for a long life. (Edges will fray slightly over time, adding to the rustic character of this piece)

"All designs and content © 2009-2011 Happy Girlz Designs All Rights Reserved"

name: I Love You Personalized Romantic Wedding Banner/Burlap/Rustic Wedding/Eco Friendly Wedding/Boho Wedd
description:
(International Customers we welcome you! Please convo us before purchase with your country, so that we can give you your shipping quote. Thanks for understanding)

Wow! Do you think Kate will get Bill's message? Our personalized "I Love You" Banner is sure to brighten her day and make her smile!

Deluxe Burlap Banner features: Two names of your choice/And the words "___I Love You___" stenciled in Black/Two Handmade Satin & Organza Flowers on each end! (Letters and accent flower can be made in your choice of colors---just send us a convo with your colors and names).

This banner will be a romantic surprise if you mail it to your beloved for them to open or if you hang it yourself in a special place for them to find! What a simple way to show your love to that special someone. If you want to send a longer message, why not pair this banner with our "Marry Me?" banner seen in picture #5 and here: http://www.etsy.com/listing/63102329/marry-me-romantic-wedding (Convo me for a special package price, when you purchase both banners!)

This banner is a large size and measures almost 6ft across. There are hemp cord ties on each side that measure 2.5 ft each.

All of our Banners are made of 100% eco-friendly materials and are securely sewn with treated edges for a long life. (Edges will fray slightly over time, adding to the rustic character of this piece)

name: Open Hearts Love Banner/Burlap/Rustic Wedding/Eco Friendly Wedding/Boho Wedding/Wall Decor/Car Decor
description:
How romantic! Our original Open Hearts Banner says "Love" in a special way.

Bone Color Burlap Banner features hand painted red open hearts on each pennant. The word "Love" is stenciled in Black. (Hearts and letters can be made in your chosen color---just send us a convo).

Our small size "Love" banner would add romance to your wedding venue: use it at your card table, cake table, on a special wall, tied to your getaway car, or perhaps outdoors on a tree! A nice way to set the right tone for your guests.

This banner is a small size and measures 2.25 ft. There are hemp cord ties on each side that measure 2.5 ft each.

Banner is made of 100% eco-friendly materials and is securely sewn with treated edges for a long life. (Edges will fray slightly over time, adding to the rustic character of this piece)

***International Customers we welcome you! Please convo us before purchase with your country, so that we can give you your shipping quote. Thanks for understanding.

name: Little Burlander/Burlap and Fabric Storage Bucket/SMALL sz/FREE Custom Word of Your Choice/Stylish O
description:
Made to Order. Please allow 7 - 10 days for your item to be made.

(International Customers we welcome you! Please convo us before purchase with your country, so that we can give you your shipping quote. Thanks for understanding)

Wonderful/Natural/Eco-friendly/Super Strong/Burlap Bucket that we fondly call "Little Burlander"
(See "Big Burlander" here: http://www.etsy.com/view_listing.php?listing_id=37126605)
If you love the earthy look of Natural Textures and want real durability (think kid burlap sack races) its hard to beat Burlap. Holds plenty/looks wonderful ANYWHERE/durable/good for the environment= an awesome value!

Medium Size Burlap Bucket is big enough for small toys, wash cloths, hand towels, vegetables, fruit (looks great filled with red apples!), yarn, craft supplies, office supplies, DVD's or books. So many uses for organizing your life. (Other *colors shown in Pictures #4 & #5/Other sizes available, please convo me if you desire something other than what you see here.)

"Little Burlander" is lined in a sturdy cotton fabric of your choice or plain canvas. All seams, are double stitched for strength. Double interfaced for durability. OOAK Design features a hand printed word of choice on the front. (I can hand print any word/name of your choice, on the front, up to 7 letters, just convo me)

See "Little Burlander" with handles here: http://www.etsy.com/listing/38361993/little-burlanderburlap-and-fabric

You can have your bucket made in any of the following current Burlap colors:

Cardinal Red/
Orange
Seagrass(pale green)/
Tan/
Brown/
Lite Aqua Blue

Our Current Lining Colors can be seen here: (copy & paste into your browser)
http://www.flickr.com/photos/56397442@N07/

(These colors are in addition to our basic cotton taupe, bone or black color linings.)

MEASUREMENTS: 6 - 6 1/2" High
7" Wide
6 - 6 1/2" Deep

CARE: Spot Cleaning is best for Burlap.

**If you want a set of 3 baskets, we will discount 10% for the set!

"All designs and content © 2009-2011 Happy Girlz Designs All Rights Reserved"

name: Jamaica Dream Burlap and Canvas Shoulder Bag/Mid Size Diaper Bag/Tote/Bridal Tote/Vacation Bag
description:
Ready to Ship.

Jamaica Dream gives you a taste of the Island wherever you go! Perfect for the girl on the beach/out to market/on vacation/or just out on the town/ Jamaica has you and all of your essentials covered!

This original mid size design is ruffled in the front for a "girly" touch, but with the strength of canvas and burlap to take on all the demands of your daily activities with comfortable style.

Bag exterior is a beautiful Tangerine Orange colored burlap fabric with solid natural color canvas straps with a gorgeous coordinating printed canvas for the tab and lining! This bag is double interfaced and the seams are double stitched for added strength and durability and lasting shape. The handles are interfaced as well, which makes them comfortable, durable & soft!


Inside you will find plenty of room and pockets. This mid-size bag features: a large main compartment, 1 large pocket divided into 3 sections. 1 large zipper pocket for personal items, a pencil/pen slide and a key fob.

Closure:
Loop and Button (Wood)


Jamaica a beautiful Bag, named for the Island. Dream It!


This handbag is available in the above color Tangerine Orange or can be made to order in these colors:

Tahitian Blue/
Summer Chocolate/
Sandy Tan/
Ruby Red/
Ocean Green/
(Please type your color choice in Message to the Seller during checkout. *** Please allow 7 - 10 days for Made-to-Order Bags to be shipped)

We ship priority in the US with delivery confirmation, so that your item arrives in great shape!

Convo me with any questions.

Measurements:
Bottom width: 16.25"
Top width: 16.25"
Bag Height: 11.5"
Strap drop length: 11"
Strap width: 1.5"

***International Customers we welcome you! Please convo us before purchase with your country, so that we can give you your shipping quote. Thanks for understanding.
